thread.section_title: Sportsmemorabilia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportsmemorabilia | www.sportsmemorabilia.com
thread.title: Trent Shemwell

author: Trent Shemwell
title: Trent Shemwell
text: I recently ordered an item for my son's birthday and unfortunately received the wrong item. Andrea Mendoza quickly got in touch with me and provided me with instructions for returning the item and making sure that my son received the order in time for his birthday. She was very professional and responsive to my needs. More places need people like Andrea in their customer service department. I will continue to shop with Fanatics, especially knowing the level of customer service that is provided by people like Andrea.
